1660617881720.content:
A boy named Kyle wins a award in a essay contest.
He gets an opportunity to go to Mr. LemonCello's library with the other winners.
Mr. LemonCello offers an escape game and in the library, Kyle and his friends find clues and solve puzzles to escape the library.
1660617881720.title: Escape from Mr. Lemoncello's Library

1660712530622.content: August wants to be ordinary like other kids, but others look at him like as if he is a monster. He starts to find good friends and get used to the school life.
1660712530622.title: Wonder

1660757823976.content: Jason wakes up without any memory in a bus with kids his age. He's very curious on how he lost his memory and also about some other kids. Leo Valdez is a very hyperactive kid who seems that he couldn't live without moving every millisecond. He claims that he is Jason's best friend and that the cute girl next to him was Piper Mclean who was also his girlfriend. Leo said that he was part of the wilderness school, a school known for raising troublesome children. Their on a field trip to the grand canyon. Jason finds a gold coin that he didn't remember. He finds it disturbing that there is a thunderstorm indoors. The coach finds it weird too but no one else notices it. Leo falls into the canyon and he grabs on for dear life as he screams for help.  Coach Hedge took off his shoes and underneath were hooves. Jason calls coach Hedge a faun, and Gleeson Hedge corrects it into satyr(say-dar(a mythical creature that his human from above the waist and goat under the waist)) The satyr climbs down the canyon and holds onto Leo, who is still freaking out because his coach was half goat. The thunderstorm got bigger as the winds got stronger. There was a Venti(storm spirit) who knocks piper and Jason down. Jason acts on instinct and flips his golden coin that turned into a sword!!!!!(A freaking golden sword!!!) and slashes 2 storm spirits who turn into golden dust. The last one pushes piper off the grand canyon as Jason jumps after her on instinct not knowing how he's gonna survive.
1660757823976.title: The Heroes of Olympus, Book One The Lost Hero (new cover)

1660792658742.content: It's 1936 in Flint Michigan and times are hard, but 10 year old motherless Bud isn't going to give up. He decides to start off by finding his father, who he doesn't even konw. But his got a clue and nothing can stop him from going back. With only a suitcase of his special things and an advertisement flyer with the clue of his father's identy, Bud sets off on a mission to uncover his father. Can Bud actually find him or is the ten year boy trying to do the impossible?
1660792658742.title: Bud, Not Buddy

1660792816143.content: Katniss Everdeen is a girl who lives in a place , where every year there is the hunger games. The hunger games are held by people from the Capitol and is a deadly game on live TV. In the hunger games, you have to kill everyone else to live and you can die in various ways. For example, get killed by others, starve, drown, burn, infected wounds, thirst, and more. Evey dstrict picks one boy and one girl through age 12 to 18. But Katniss volunteered to play when her sister got picked. Can Katniss survive the hunger games?
1660792816143.title: The Hunger Games

1660793011622.content: Nicholas Allen was a very creative student. He had lots of ideas, and weren't afraid of using them. But when he begins calling pens "frindle," some people doesn't like that idea. Like Mrs. Granger, his math teacher. But Nick doesn't back down and Mrs. Granger wasn't going to let Nick win either. Can Nick win the frindle war?
1660793011622.title: Frindle

1660793132648.content: Mia Tang lives in a motel. But things are more complicated then it seems like. Mias parents hide immigrants illegally in the motel and if the owner, Mr Yao finds out, they will be doomed. Mia also wants to be a writer, but her mom refuses to support her. Things look bad enough, but Mias biggest obstacle yet tp come. With her parents earnong so low and with her own problems at school, Mia's future isn't looking too bright. Can Mia get over her family's problem and move on or is things to hard for that?
1660793132648.title: Front Desk

1660793250472.content: Finn McAllister died in the course of trying to avoid a truck on his bike. He ended up falling off a cliff. But everyone thinks the reason he died was that he tried to pull a stunt with his bike. Determined to prove them wrong, Finn tries to figure out the identy of the truck driver. Can Finn find the truck driver and tell the police, even though his dead?
1660793250472.title: Best Nerds Forever

1660793363647.content: Jake was a lazy kid. But it all changed when he ate a jar of jellybeans he found in a hotel. Suddenly his a genius at every single subject. It looks like Jake's life is as good as it can be, but when he runs into a problem at school, he has to solve it with is incredible brain. Can Jake save the school or will he just go back to being a lazy kid?
1660793363647.title: The Smartest Kid in the Universe

1660793459909.content: Billy and his mom are staying on Dr Libris's cabin that they rented. But right away, Billy notices strange stuff, like how his pillow is made out of metal and a shelf in the library needs a special key, which you have to solve with a riddle. It's also not helping when Billy hears freaky sounds everytime he opens a book. Can Billy uncover the reasons behind the weird cabin and the island?
1660793459909.title: The Island of Dr. Libris

1660793578447.content: Claudia decides to run away from home to teach her parents a lesson. But she knows that she can't affor to go alone on this trip, so she decides to take her brother, Jamie whose loaded. They decides to heads toward the Metropolitan Museum of Art for their shelter at night. But it's not easy to not get by the maxim security system that the museum have, and even if they do what will they do next? Can Claudia find a way to live all by herself and Jamie in a museum illegally with no proper money or food?
1660793578447.title: From the Mixed-up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler

1660793990430.content: Eli Frieden lives in the most perfect town in the world: Serenity, New Mexico. But Eli notices strange stuff and the town didn't seem so perfect anymore. Soon, he discovers something way more serious than he thought and he decides to do something about it. With his three friends, Can Eli save himself or is the towns secret going to catch up to him and make him pay?
1660793990430.title: Masterminds

1660794070566.content: Jett, a son of a millonare, has been forced to attend in someplace where electronic devices are against the rules and only serve healty stuff like vegatables. Jett, Tyler, Grace, and Brooklyn gets to know each other along the way. Then Jett notices wierd stuff. Will Jett find out the truth and live to tell the tale?
1660794070566.title: Unplugged

1660796716314.content: Roy, a new kid in Florida learns that a pancake house is going to be built. But there's one problem. There are burrowing owls living there and the workers will bury them alive. Roy knows that he can't do anything about, but fortunately, another person is vandalizing the site to delay the building. Can Roy find a way to pitch in and help the vandalizer in time, or will the constructing site  kill the owls before he does?
1660796716314.title: Hoot

1660797562076.content: Roy(the main charactor) is a new boy in town.He found out there will be a new panckake house named Mother Paula.However it will endanger the owls that are living on the building site of the new restauramt.Roy is  trying to prevent the pancake restaurant from entering the owl's habitat with his two friends.
1660797562076.title: Hoot

1660799141690.content: Alex and Conner are twins and they live  with their mother. Their father passed away.When it is the twins birthday their grandma visits them them and as their present they recieve a special fairy tale book.Later when they open the book suprisingly they get sucked into the book-The Land of Stories!bThis lamd id where fairy tales are real.
1660799141690.title: The Land of Stories: The Wishing Spell

1660800213314.content: When a fortuneteller's tent appears in the market square of the city where an  orphan named  Peter Augustus Duchene has a questions that he needs to ask:Is his sister still alive?If she is, is there any way he can find her? The fortuneteller's mysterious and unbelievable answer (an elephant! An elephant will lead him there!)sets an event nearly impossible but all of it ,every bit is true.
1660800213314.title: The Magician's Elephant

1660801579296.content: Minli lives in the valley of fruitless mountain.Every night Minli askes her dad to tell ther the tale of the Old Man Of Th Moon.He is a man who can answer any questions asked.But her mother think it is very foolish of her to belive the impossible story .Despite the fact her mother's thought, Minli prepares for a jouney in order  find the Old Man Of The  Moon.She wants to ask the man how she can bring fortune to her family easily.During the quest she meets many magical friends that includes a talking fish,a dragon who can't fly ETC.
1660801579296.title: Where the Mountain Meets the Moon

1660841310814.content: Percy Jackson is on a field trip with Grover underwood and the rest of his class. He fought  Nancy Bobofit who bullied Percy everyday that he attended Yancy academy. Percy thought that his pre algebra teacher, Ms. Dodds  wanted to get him in trouble, but Ms.Dodds had different ideas. She tried to kill Percy because she was one of the furies(three devil women with wings)!! Suddenly his favorite teacher came along on his wheelchair and gave Percy a pen, That turned into a sword on his hand.
1660841310814.title: Percy Jackson and the Lightning Thief (Book 1)

1660842567786.content: Ravi is an Indian boy who's new in school. Joe is a tall kid with hearing problems called APD. At first, both of them think they have nothing in common. But they soon realize they share the same enemy, a bully in their class. It doesn't look like they're going to get any closer though, but things are unpredictable and Ravi and Joe starts finding more similarities. Will Ravi and Joe be friends or will they both me alone and bullied?
1660842567786.title: Save Me a Seat

1660855787063.content: It has been 2 years after Brian survived 44 days in the canadian wilderness, and the government wants him to do it again to learn what he did to survive. So Brian and a government psycologist, Derek Holtzer, goes to the wilderness. But a big storm hits and Dereks life is in danger. The only hope is to transport Derek a hundred miles down the River. Can Brian save Dereks life, or will both of them die along the way?
1660855787063.title: The River

1660862387693.content: Daniel spends most of his time hoping nobody notices his strange coditions he calls Zaps. For example, avoiding writing number four, or flipping out a light switch on and off dozens of times. His life gets even wierder when a girl nicknamed Psyco Sara notices him for the first time. Then, Daniel gets a mysterious note asking for help. Can Daniel help the note giver?
1660862387693.title: OCDaniel

1660862802651.content: David and Michael each got nickname back in preschool. But there nicknames, pottymouth and stoopid, are still stuck when they're in 7th grade. To make things worse, everybody, the teacher, the students, and even the pricipal thinks the labels are true. Can David and Michael change how everybody thinks of them?
1660862802651.title: Pottymouth and Stoopid

1660863612737.content: Link, Michael, and Dana lives in a quiet town. But it's woken up when someone vandalize the school and spray paint a swastika. Then, swastikas appear everywhere in school. The town is on news and Link's father, the mayor of town isn't looking so good on papers. It's not long before famouse internet sensation appears for the scoop and the town is in a frenzy. Can anyone figure out the school vandalizer before things get even more out of hand?
1660863612737.title: Linked

1660866730156.content: Seventh grader Zoey is busy taking care of her younger siblings when she's at home and she tries to stay under radar at school. At least they lived in a clean trailer, thanks to her mom's boyfriend. But her teacher force her in joining the debate club at school and even though she didn't like the idea at first, it helped her see things in a new way. For example, how Lenny, her mother's boyfriend treats her mother like. Can Zoey get the courage to speak up, even if it means losing a lot of things?
1660866730156.title: The Benefits of Being an Octopus

1660867555192.content: Willa likes it when things go her way. And there are some things she can't deal with, like her father's big secret. Her father was dating her best friend's mom. Willa doesn't want to combine families, she doesn't want to be half-sisters with her best friend, and she doesn't want to be together with a new family. Can Willa go along with all these changes?
1660867555192.title: Not If I Can Help It

1660868123884.content: After Georgina's father left her and the rest of her family, they begin to have money problems. When she see a missing dog poster, she has the idea of stealing a dog and getting the reward money. But stealing a dog isn't that easy and you have to pick a person whose rich enough to pay you. Can Georgina steal the dog and get the reward money? Or will she get caught while doing so?
1660868123884.title: How to Steal a Dog

1660869902033.content: Ally can't read. But she was smart enough to fool everybody. However, the new teacher, Mr. Daniels doesn't seem to buy the act. If Ally can't convince her teacher, she would get humiliated in front of the whole school, and never hear the end of it. Can Ally find another way to hide her reading disability or is this the end of hiding?
1660869902033.title: Fish in a Tree

1660870655633.content: Aven Green was born without her arms. When her foster parents get a job at a western theme park in Arizona, she moves there. At her new school, she makes a new friend, Conor.  But when she discover a room in her parents new theme park with Conor, everything changes. Can she investigate a mystery and be a good friend at the same time?
1660870655633.title: Insignificant Events in the Life of a Cactus

1660871614537.content: Fifth grader Tamaya Dhilwaddi and seventh grader Marshall Walsh takes a shortcut through the woods. They soon get lost. But there were bigger problems waiting for them. Problems leading to world catastrophe. How will Tamaya and Marshall going to the woods affect the world?
1660871614537.title: Fuzzy Mud

1660882146439.content:
A girl named Sammy Keyes gets herself into some very interesting situations on halloween night.
She finds a man who is wearing a monster mask in the bush house tied to a chair.
Sammy does not think that it's just a man playing halloween games.
She starts to investigate.
I think that Sammy could become a investigator when she grows up.
And the story about the skeleton man is kinda thrilling.
1660882146439.title: Sammy Keyes and the Skeleton Man

1660885689883.content: When the park's mascot Henry the hippo dies, Teddy Fitzroy decides to investigate. Then he gets lucky when he meets Summer McCracken, the owner's daughter and a celebrity. Summer decides to help and that's a huge benefit for Teddy. Can Teddy solve the murder of Henry the hippo with Summer's help?
1660885689883.title: Belly Up

1660886775462.content: The Rylance family is stuck. Ethan's dad hasn't written in years, his mom died, his sister still wants a puppy, and he has to illustrate a group project at school. But that all changes when inkling is discovered by Ethen. Inkling, a moving form of ink that can express it's feeling like a human and has knowledge like the humans, is the key out of Ethans problem. Can Ethan use the inkling and keep it safe from others' eye?
1660886775462.title: Inkling

1660887693910.content: Harry Mancini lives at the house where Harry Houdini himself lived. He knows almost everything about Houdini. Then he finds a phone and someone texts him claiming to be Houdini from the grave. It's hard to believe at first, but he could explain all the secrets behind Houdini's tricks. And it doesn't stop there. Houdini offers him to trade places with the old Houdini, back when he was alive. But the more Harry gets to know Houdini, the more he gets worried that Houdini wants to trade places for good. Can Harry stop the unstoppable legend, Harry Houdini?
1660887693910.title: Houdini and Me

1660888306762.content: Violet, Klaus, and Sunny Baudelaire were three orphans. Before Count Olaf, a distant cousin adopted them. But instead of being nice, he plotted to steal all their money when they're old enough and make them do all the houseworks. Can Violet, Klaus, and Sunny bust out of the horrible place?
1660888306762.title: The Bad Begining

1660926629014.content: It was supposed to be a vacation. Before a big storm hits the ship, and Vanessa, Carter, Buzz, and Jane are stranded on an island. They have supplies, but it's not going to last long on the island. And if the rescue plane doesn't come soon, all four of them will die a mysterious death that none will know about.  Can the four of them survive on the island when the odds aren't even?
1660926629014.title: Stranded

1660927974642.content:
This book is about a boy named August Pullman, who has facial differences. When it was Auggie was homeschooled until 4'th grader because he had lots of surgery. It was first day of 5'th grade, and he was new in beecher prep middle school. Everybody didn't wanted to plaay with Auggie, but after the nature retreval trip incidence, auggie was pretty popular!
     For the details, read â€˜wonder'!
1660927974642.title: Wonder

1660928225900.content: Landon wants to play football. But he couldn't play because he was deaf. It all changes when he moves to a new town though. Hoping the teasing will stop he goes to the school. But he still gets bullied. Can Landon fight his way out of it and make the football team even though he's deaf?
1660928225900.title: Left Out

1660929339044.content:
Ivy doesn't trust dragonslayer, even though he's her father. 
Leaf doesn't trust dragons because he thinks they took his sister.
Wren doesn't trust anyone. After her parents tried to feed her to the dragons.
In this world of dragons, humans have to scramble every time they see a dragon. But Ivy, Leaf, and Wren each cross their own bizzare path. Can all three of them complete thair own missions, or will the dragons kill them all?
1660929339044.title: Dragonslayer

1660930254283.content: Amy and Dan Cahill discovered that their family was one of the most powerful humans in history. Now, they had a chance of getting a million dollar or getting a clue. Amy and Dan decides to get a clue and participate in the race. Can Amy and Dan win a dangerous race against their relatives?
1660930254283.title: The 39 Clues Book 1: The Maze of Bones

1660941441225.content: When all of the people that lived on the island leaves to an another island, Karana and her brother are alone for a while. But when nobody come back for her, she has to survive on her own. After her brother was killed by a pack of wild dogs, Karana has been afraid of them ever since. Can Karana survive on the island alone?
1660941441225.title: Island of the Blue Dolphins

1660942373336.content: Stanley Yelnats has been sent to a boys' detention center for a crime he didn't commit. At the center, Stanley and other boys, had to dig holes to build character. Then, Stanley realizes there's more to digging than building character. He thinks that the warden is looking for something. What can the  warden possibly be looking for and what's going to happen?
1660942373336.title: Holes

1660954880627.content: Eleven year old Melody is different from others. She can't walk, she can't talk, she can't write because she has celebral palsy. From the outside, she looks and acts dumb,  but she is pretty smart inside. When there is a trivia contest against other schools that leads to a tournament on TV, Melody has the chance to show that she's not dumb. Can Melody prove that she can be like others or better?
1660954880627.title: Out of My Mind

1660967489616.content: When Greg accidentally time travel back to the 1600s France, he is stuck. After his parent were sent to the dungeon, Greg has to a way to free them and go back to the 21st century. But Greg already has enemies and the 1600s France is nothing like he expected. If he doesn't find a way to free his parents before their death sentence, Greg will be stuck forever with no way back home. Can Greg find a way to go back or is he stuck forever?
1660967489616.title: The Last Musketeer

1660969444775.content: When Miranda starts getting myterious notes saying that she must write a true story, and not share what she's doing, she can't just ignore it. It would be easy to, but whoever's sending the note has an ability of predicting the future and the notes tell her someone is going to die. Can Miranda find the note giver or will she just do what the notes say?
1660969444775.title: When You Reach Me

1660970191479.content: After Jayson's mother died and her boyfriend abandons him, Jayson is forced to live on his own. But after he got caught stealing basketball sneakers, he is sent to live in a new home belonging to a new family. He has to go to a new school and play in a different basketball team. Can Jayson live in a place where he doesn't belong?
1660970191479.title: Fast Break

1660970509084.content: In the moon base where Dashiell Gibson lives, there is no place to hide. But when Nina Stack, the commander of Moon Base Alpha goes missing, nobody can find her. And since Dashiell is the best detective around, he decides to solve the mystery. Can Dashiell find the commander of the base?
1660970509084.title: Spaced Out

1660970886116.content: When Kiana moves into a new town that she will be staying for a month or two, she doesn't take school seriously. And when her stepmother gets too busy to register her, she decides to just do it herself. But she ends up in the worst class possible. The Unteachables. How can Kiana stay in the same room with the Unteachables when she doesn't belong?
1660970886116.title: The Unteachables

1660971600746.content: Rusty was a kittypet, a cat raised by twolegs (humans). But it all changes when the clan cats see him hunt. Now, Rusty is one of the clan cats. He gets a new name and he trains with others. But Rusty can't trust Tigerclaws, a cat that had been named deputy after the old one died. He suspects Tigerclaws had to do something with the old deputy's death. Can Rusty find out more about Tigerclaws and become a warrior?
1660971600746.title: Warriors #1: Into the Wild

1661028797081.content: Little man can throw the meanest fastballs but he can't talk. He can't even say he's own name. So when he  take over his friend's paper delivering job, he is not looking forward to it. But that's not the real trouble, the real trouble includes a bully and a thief. Can Little man avoid the trouble, or is he headed straight towards it?
1661028797081.title: Paperboy

1661030690628.content: Aidan had been gone for six days without a trace. And then he just came back in his room with a crazy story which is unbelievable. Lucas, Aidan's brother wants to believe his impossible story, and figure out where he has really been at. But the more Aidan tells, the more Lucas believes it's true. Can Lucas really find out what happened at those six days, or will he except the fact that Aidans seems to be telling the truth?
1661030690628.title: The Mysterious Disappearance of Aidan S.

1661054022113.content:
Alder had always lived in a house in Southern California. And there was always a old walnut tree that was between his house and next door. But a new family moves in and cut the tree down. 
Oak doesn't understand why her family has to move to Southern California. And when she did, her mom had to cut down a tree in order to make room for second floor. Also, the kid next door kept staring at her like she did something wrong. 
Alder and Oak can't imagine becoming friends, but the two of them soon discover a magical, mysterious puzzle. Can they solve the puzzle?
1661054022113.title: The House That Wasn't There

1661055813706.content: Four lucky boys and girls have the chance to go inside a building that will lead them to an amazing scavenger hunt. They will play different games and each game will get the players closer to the titanium ticket. And when Simon gets to play, he's thrilled. Can Simon win the titanium ticket and perhaps something even bigger?
1661055813706.title: Mr. Lemoncello and the Titanium Ticket

1661056399908.content: When Brian was visiting his father, the pilot had a heart attack and died. Brian managed to land the plane safely, but he is stranded in the harsh condition of the wilderness. Brian has no choice but to try to survive with only a hatchet. Brian needs food, shelter, and weapons to survive, but is all of that possible with only a small hatchet and nothing else?
1661056399908.title: Hatchet

1661057536719.content: Decades ago, Albert Einstein devised an equation that could benefit all lives, or destroy them. Fearing it will fall into the wrong hands, he hid it. But now, a group known as the Furies are close to finding it and the CIA drags in Charlie Thorne in desperation. Charlie may be a genius, but can stop the Furies and save the world?
1661057536719.title: Charlie Thorne and the Last Equation

1661058466078.content: After saving the world, Charlie Thorne decided to take it easy and go to the Galapagos island. That is untill mysterious Esmeralda Castle approaches her with a code that she know Charlie can decipher. A code by Charles Darwin that leads to more clues. The clues leads to South America, where she has to track down Darwin's secret discovery. But Charlie has enemys right behind her. Can Charlie find the discovery first?
1661058466078.title: Charlie Thorne and the Lost City

1661091625191.content: Percy fights giant cannibal giants(giants inhumane claws and teeth) and manages to destroy the whole school during one dodgeball game, luckily his best friend during his time in the semester saved him. Tyson was a very big kid with lots of scratches on his body and fur on his back. They head back to camp half-blood with Annabeth and Tyson, because he was actually an cyclops!! On his first day there, Tyson fought mechanic bulls and during dinner, Tyson was claimed by Posidon, Percy's father, meaning Percy was Tyson's brother.
1661091625191.title: Percy Jackson and the Sea of Monsters

1661100770849.content: Coyote hadn't been to her home for five years. She lived with her father and traveled around in a school bus and she's fine with it. But when she learns that a park where her mom and her sisters buried a memory box, she has to get there. But her dad isn't willoing to and Coyote needs to find a way fast before her memories with her mother and sisters gets destroyed. Can Coyote go back to her home thats 3600 miles away in such a short period of time? Before the bulldozers comes to destroy her last bits of memory?
1661100770849.title: The Remarkable Journey of Coyote Sunrise

1661117386817.content: Did you know that humans evolved from an ancestor who also happened to be the ancestor of monkeys? That's right. We are the cousins of funny looking cartoon nonkeys. This book is written by one of yhe best evolutionary scientist. Read this book to get to know about how biological things are made from 'the blind watchmaker' which means the nature makes something complex like watch with a blind.
1661117386817.title: The Blind Watchmaker

1661118950375.content: Donovan Curtis isn't gifted. But his friend, Noah is a genius. After all the years of studying and taking tests, Noah's dream is to fail. And he landed in the best place for that, Donavan's school. Almost immediately, Noah gets to be the main victim of bullying. If that isn't bad enough, a freak accident suddenly makes Donavan a hero.  But Donovan can't tell anyone. Can he keep his identity a secret?
1661118950375.title: Supergifted

1661120182376.content: Danny Owens decides that he should earn a spot at the school varsity team this season. Then, his english teacher catches him cheating. He could retake it, but he knows he can't succeed because he can't read. And if he doesn't pass the test, he wouldn't be able to play the championship game that could benefit his future life. Can Danny pass the test or is this the end of his football path?
1661120182376.title: The Big Game

1661131283605.content: Brian Robeson has survived in the wilderness for a long time. But now, that Brian's back in high school, he misses the nature. And so he decides to return, to nature, where he truly belongs. Can Brian go back to the place he belongs and live like he did so many months ago? Or will this time be  the end of his short life?
1661131283605.title: Brian's Return

1661205002252.content:
Mr Popper is a house painter who only works in spring that is completely obsessed with the Arctic. He's a big fan of Admiral Drake and he thinks penguins will make good pets.
And he actually gets one.
One day, a penguin arrives in the doorstep.
See what happens as Mr. Popper watches the penguins have eggs, joins a circus, goes to jail, and takes off towards the Arctic!
1661205002252.title: Mr. Popper's Penguins

1661216060358.content: Bycicle lived most of her life in the Washington DC. But when her guardian says she's going to attend a camp where she could learn to make friends, Bycicle runs away with her bike to meet her idol in San Francisco. Bycicle doesn't know it yet, but her journey is going to be far more interesting and harder than she thinks. Can Bycicle really meet her idol whose so far away or will she just give up?
1661216060358.title: The Adventures of a Girl Called Bicycle

1661283338366.content:
What if Anne with An e hadn't met Marilla and Matthew Buthbert? 
What if Anne with An e hadn't had that powerful imagination? 
She had so little but her mental strength raised me.
1661283338366.title: Anne of Green Gables

Can Corryn and Tez survive the camp, or is it going to shut down with Corryn and Tez inside it this time?

They found out Anna is the decendant of one of the most known scientist by the name of Captain "Nimo" and he has technology that is greater than even the ones the government has. Can she and her classmates get the weapons and defeat the 'evil' rivarly school?

Can Mason fix their relationship or is things going to get worse?

But at her first day at training, she finds herself in the middle of an attack. All the other mice are gone except Bernadette and a fellow rat recruit named Jarvis. Can the two new recruits save the whole mouse watch?
1661377752794.title: The Mouse Watch

1661378683613.content: Moon Base Alpha had been exciting for Dashiell Gibson. He had already solved a case of murder and another  case of a disappearance. Now, he just wants things to be calm. 1661378683613.title: Waste of Space

Can Lucy go to a middle school, where she knows kids will make fun of her unusual habits and her genius math skills?
1661379715960.title: The Miscalculations of Lightning Girl

Can they save the menagerie from shutting down or will they have to face the end?
1662193582193.title: The Menagerie #2: Dragon on Trial

1662193582195.content: Jake McQuade is the smartest kid in the universe. And he is heading to a camp for geniuses, sponsered by the genius billonare, Zane Zincle. But it's not long before Jake figures out that something strange is going on in the camp. Can Jake, the smartest kid in the universe, find out the truth behind the camp?
1662193582195.title: Genius Camp

1662193582197.content: Elliott has been struggling ever since his best friend moved away. His grades aren't great either. The only thing thats going like it's supposed to is his cooking. And a new school project isn't helping. But he manages to find a partner for the project. Can Elliott get good grades on his project and make a new friend?
1662193582197.title: Honestly Elliott

1662193592179.content: Melody is different from others, but now with her Medi-talker, she's smarter and braver. So, she decides to go to a camp with other disabled kids. A place where it's exciting and where she might find real friends. Can Melody face her fears and attend the camp where you zip line? And can she make some friends along the way?
1662193592179.title: Out of My Heart

1662193592181.content: After a rough summer, Rafe is heading back to middle school. And if that isn't bad enough, he learns his going to be held back if he can't prove himself in an outdoor survival excursion. Plus the excursion is extremely dangerous with rock climbing and rafting. But nothing compares to the final test: a solo excursion in the woods. Can Rafe make it out alive the excursion or will he be held back in school?
1662193592181.title: Save Rafe!

1662193592182.content: When his attemt to stop a illegal casino boat fails, Noah's dad gets landed in jail. With the boat back in business within days, Noah's the only one who knows what's going on. And with his dad in jail, he has to stop the boat from pumping gallons of sewage into the waters of Florida Keys. Can Noah stop the crime with his allies?
1662193592182.title: Flush

1662193592187.content: Richard's mom studies dream and sleeping patterns. So when Richard visists his mom in the hospital, they hook  Richard's dummy, Slappy up to the sleep pattern detecting machine as a joke. But now, Richard's getting nightmares about Slappy every time he sleeps. If that's not wierd enough, his cousin Willow, who was spending some time with his family, is getting nightmares about Slappy too. And when Slappy threatens them in their dreams, they have to find a way to beat him. Can Richard defeat Slappy?
1662193592187.title: Slappy in Dreamland (Goosebumps SlappyWorld #16)

1662193592189.content: Homer P. Figg's brother was sold illegally to the union army by their ruthless gaurdian. So, Homer decides to run away from home and save his brother from the war. But when your 12 years old, it's hard to get to the south all the way up from Pine Swamp, Maine. Can Homer save his brother from the war before it's too late?
1662193592189.title: The Mostly True Adventures of Homer P. Figg

1662193592193.content: Troy and his friends Tate and Nathan are leading their team to the state championship. At the same time, Troy is helping Seth Halloway and the Atlanta Falcons with his gifts. Then, everything becomes dangerous when a reporter with a grudge against Seth Halloway starts trying to dig up stories. Things are very complicated on both sides, with his football games and a sleazy reporter. Can Troy solve both of the problems?
1662193592193.title: Football Champ

1662193592195.content: Jerome was shot when a police officer mistakes his toy gun as a real threat. He becomes a ghost boy and he observes the devastation and anger of his death. Soon, he meets a fellow ghost, Emmet Till, a boy from a different time. He explains that his death happened because of racism. He also meets Sarah Moore, the daughter of the police officer, who disagrees with her father's actions. Can Jerome fix his death and teach all the people that racism is wrong with Sarah's help?
1662193592195.title: Ghost Boys

1662193592196.content: Troy's life is going fantastic with his talent leading the Falcons into the playoffs. Now agents are offering huge amount of money for him. Then, his life flips upside down when a man shows up claiming to be his father. But spending time with his dad makes him ask questions like is his dad who he really seems like he is? And can Troy find out the truth behind his dad?
1662193592196.title: The Big Time

1662193592198.content: Troy White is a football genius who can predict the other team's plays. Ty Lewis is the football hero, who plays wide receiver. Both of them are ready to win the game that will make them champions. But Troy and Ty doesn't trust each other and begins to size each other up. Who will win the big game, Troy or Ty?
1662193592198.title: Deep Zone

1662193592574.content: It is a story about the 100th day of school. ğŸ« Nancy thought it was very hard to pick what to bring in for the day. In the book, Nancy's goldfish was dead, and it reminds me the hard time when my goldfish was dead.ğŸ˜¢
1662193592574.title: Fancy Nancy: The 100th Day of School

1662193592579.content: its like a friend talking story, not a written words novel.
1662193592579.title: Ghost

1662193592580.content: When Ali's friend Gabe is reported missing, Ali is desperate to find him. And with his detective father on trial for a crime he did not commit, it's up to Ali to find Gabe. But his dad doesn't want him investigating and the truth doesn't always turn out the way it seems like. Can Ali find his friend without anyone's help?
1662193592580.title: Ali Cross

1662193592581.content: Is your life miserable? ğŸ¤” Well, wait before you decide anything and try this book out. 12 major heroes of Greek Mythology is introduced. Hercules who died of posion on shirt and lost 2 wives and killed all his family, Jason who was forgotten and died in a ship and many more. Are your life miserable ğŸ˜• as the heroes? Check out their life!
1662193592581.title: Percy Jackson's Greek Heroes

1662193592587.content: Ali and his friends were just hanging around in a park when they become witnesses of a crime. Ali's new friend Zoe is in big trouble with someone after her. Ali decides to investigate farther and figure out who's after his friend and why. Can Ali solve the hardest case he had ever faced?
1662193592587.title: Ali Cross: Like Father, Like Son

1662193592588.content: Keenan had lived in a lot of place around the world, but nowhere as strange as Centerlight island. The only thing wierder is his neighbor, Zarabeth, aka ZeeBee. ZeeBee is extremely obsessed with the island's past and is sure that her notorious dog Barney had been murdered. As Keenan and ZeeBee start to unravel the clues, they find the shocking conspiracy that dates back to the gangster days. With someone after them, Keenan and ZeeBee have to find something bigger than a dog murderer. Can they find the thing and solve the dog mystery too?
1662193592588.title: Notorious

1662193592681.content: Trevor doesn't love anything more than his war hero great-grandfather and playing war based video games. So when his great-grandfather gets an invitation to a french village he saved, Trevor's hooked. But the trip tells him that there's more to the story than his great-grandfather told him. Can Trevor find out the truth?
1662193592681.title: War Stories

1662193592684.content: Winnie's last day of fourth grade had the biggest impact on her life. That was the day her parents got divorced. And everything had to be equal between her mom and dad. 3 days with her mom, 3 days with her dad, and living alone in a treehouse on Wednesdays. By the end of fifth grade, Winnie had enough. So, she decides to barricade herself in the treehouse with her friends. But stuff becomes complicated and things are heating up. Can Winnie and her friends stay upright or will a fight destroy them all?
1662193592684.title: The Great Treehouse War

1662193592685.content: Every year, the people of Protectorate lives a baby as an offering to the witch who lives in the forest. They hope the sacrifices will keep them safe. But the witch, Xan is kind and gentle. Xan rescues the babies and take them where it's safe. One year though, Xan accidentally feeds a baby moonlight, so she decides to raise her with the name Luna. Things are quiet and peaceful, but it all changes when a man decides to kill Xan. Now everythings up to Luna. Can Luna protect Xan, the witch who had kept her alive for so many years?
1662193592685.title: The Girl Who Drank the Moon (Winner of the 2017 Newbery Medal)

1662193592686.content: When the Corona virus hits Hong Kong, Knox, his mom, his brother, and his sister move to the US. But Knox's life is getting worse and worse each day. With problems at school and with only little money, Knox's life doesn't seem to be going like it should. Can Knox find a way to make his family make a little bit of more money, or is he just more trouble than he's worth?
1662193592686.title: New from Here

1662193592688.content: Greg had always been into money.  He had lots of money even though he was still young. Then, Greg found the best place to earn money. The cafeteria in school. But his new buisness gets disturbed when someone trys to earn money the way he does. Can Greg keep the sale going or will his sale go down hill?
1662193592688.title: Lunch Money

1662193592706.content: Ever since Corey Fletcher found out that he could go back in time, he had been spending time in the past as much as possible. Corey had spent most of his time helping friends and family with his skills. But he knows time travel can change him in a dangerous way. So, he decides to go back to the World War two era for his final trip. Can Corey change the human history forever?
1662193592706.title: Throwback: the Chaos Loop

1662193592707.content: Not long after Georges move into a new apartment in Brooklyn, he meets his neighbor, Safer. They quickly become fellow spies. Their mission: Tracking the mysterious Mr. X who lives upstairs. But Safer's request grow more and more demanding. Can Georges go farther for Safer's sake or will he end this spy buisness once in for all?
1662193592707.title: Liar & Spy

1662193592790.content: It has been few months after the candy contest, and Logan, Miles, Daisy, and Phillip is living their usual lives. But when the contest winning candy is ready to be sold outside the factory, Logan realizes there's something wrong with it. Logan, Miles, Daisy, and Phillip goes on an adventure to find the secret ingredient that was in the candy and was hidden away for 50 years. Can they find the ingredient with the stakes high as ever?
1662193592790.title: The Candymakers and the Great Chocolate Chase

1662193592797.content: Since kindergarten, Max and Josey were best friends. But one day, Josie disappears leaving only a note about something called "Whatnot rules." 1662983831262.content: Ben Roberson is a bold hitter, who can hit a homerun when he connects with the ball. Matt baker is a small and he stutters, which makes him avoid the spotlight, even if his the best baseball player overall. So it comes as a surprise when Ben asks matt to help with his swing. But Ben doesn't take Matt seriously and end of season is coming soon. Can Ben come through and understand that bigger isn't always better, and can Matt become a stronger person and stick up for himself?
1662983831262.title: Batting Order

1662990216739.content: It was just an ordinary day, when Charlie Fisher witnesses a group of pick-pockets pull an icredible robbery in Marseille. He decides to follow one of them and when the pick-pocket got caught, he stuck up for him rather than reporting him. In return, the pick-pocket had to teach Charlie the tricks of stealing. It started off as a lesson, but later on, Charie got to join a secret international band of child thieves, the Whizz Mob. But what at first seemed like a harmless game turns into a dangerous mission. Can Charlie suceed with global stakes higher than he had ever imagined?
1662990216739.title: The Whiz Mob and the Grenadine Kid

1662991008320.content: Serafina has been living in the basement of  Biltmore Estate in secret. Living her life, she learned how to sneak and hide. But when children who was staying at the estate start disappearing, only Serafina knows the culprit: a man in a black coat who stalks the estate at night. Risking her secret life, Serafina teams up wth Braeden Vanderbilt, the nephew of Biltmore's owners. Can Serafina and Braeden uncover the true identity of the man in the black coat, or will all the children disappear one by one?
1662991008320.title: Serafina and the Black Cloak

1662991596597.content: After Ollie made the deal wih the smiling man to save her dad and her friends, she vanished without a trace. The smiling man promised Brian, Coco, and Phil that they could save her, but they begin to think that it's a lie and Ollie is dead. But finally, they get a clue and when the carnival comes to town, they have the chance to save Ollie. Meanwhile, Ollie is trapped in another world and her only chance is for Bian, Coco, and Phil to save her. Can Ollie's friend save her only untill sunrise, or is it all over for Ollie?
1662991596597.title: Empty Smiles

1662992118231.content: Sara Martinez is going to be facing years in Juvenile detention facility after she hacked into the New York City foster care system to expose her foster parents. But then a man who calls himself "Mother" not only gets Sara released from jail, but also offer her a chance to work with the MI6. Operating in a base in Scotland, Sara trains with five fellow kid MI6 agents. Later on, Sara heads to Paris for an internationl youth summit. Her job is to hack into the rival school's computer. This should have been easy for a talented hacker like Sara, but she finds herself in a harder mission than just hacking a computer. Can Sara do all this, or is it too much job for a kid?
1662992118231.title: City Spies

1662992880039.content: While Abraham Lincoln is widely konown for freeing millions of slaves, his fight against vampires remained unkown for many decades. That is untill Seth Grahame-Smith stumbles upon the secret journal of Abraham Lincoln. In the journal is the real story of Abraham Lincoln and how he sets out on a path of vengeance, that will lead him all the way to the white house.
1662992880039.title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter

1663061912623.content: Van doesn't get noticed by others much. But he notices them, and other small details. Then one day, Van notices a girl stealing pennies from the fountain and he decides to follow her. He follows the girl, and Van uncovers an underground base where people collects wishes. At first, Van decides to help the collectors (people who collect wishes), but later on he learns that there's more to the story then he was told. Can Van do the right thing, or is he helping the bad guys?
1663061912623.title: The Collectors

1663062397510.content: Marcus Vega is six feet tall and 180 pounds. He is both a threat and a target in middle school. After he fights in school, he's suspended and his mom takes him and his brother to Puetro Rico to spend a week with relatives. But Marcus have bigger things in his life, like how his father, a man who left Marcus ten years ago is living in Puetro Rico too. So, Marcus sets off to find his father, but things don't go as expected. Can Marcus find his father, and if he does whtat happens next?
1663062397510.title: Marcus Vega Doesn't Speak Spanish

1663062832559.content: Billy has wanted a dog since he was a little boy. So when he saves enough money to finally buy two hounds, he starts training them right away. Soon, Billy and his dogs become the best hunters in his town. Stories about Billy and his hounds spread, but Billt learns that life isn't always fair. Can Billy deal with the loses that are soon to come?

1663156108144.content: On a night in Amsterdam, Archibald McQuinn, the legendary burglar fell off a roof. Before the police arrives, the buglar manages to tell hs son to "find jewels." Later on, March, the burglar's son, learns that his father meant his twin sister Jules, that March didn't even know that existed. But after the two meets, they're caught by the police and sent to an orphanage. March and Jules doesn't want to live in a place like the orphanage though, and they decides to escape. But bigger problems are waiting for them in the fututre. Can March and Jules use their stealing talents to save their own lives?
1663156108144.title: Loot

1663407464340.content: Callan is in need for money, and when he's hired for a job that pays enough to start over his life, he's all for it. There is just one problem: He needs to steal a well gaurded treasure from the strongest socerer in the city along with five other kids. All five is desperate for money and they have to trust each other to steal the treasure. But that isn't easy as it seems, when you live a shadowy life where you can only trust yourself. Can the five young thieves steal the most heavily guarded treasure in the city?
1663407464340.title: Children of the Fox

1663408083279.content: Elizabeth Somer's aunt and uncle sends Elizabeth to a grand hotel, the Winterhouse owned ny Norbridge Falls. After she arrives she finds a massive libraries and a magical book that can unlock the mystery of Norbrige Fall's sinister family. With the help with her new friend, Elizabeth decides to solve the mystery of the Falls family. But the more deeper she investigates, the more trouble she finds herself in. Can Elizabeth break the Hotel's curse or will the people living the the hotel all die?
1663408083279.title: Winterhouse

1663408557993.content: When Caitlyn moves to a new home and a new school, all the students talk about is Paulie Fink, a student who was here before her. Caitlyn learns that Paulie was class clown, trouble maker, genius, and a total legend. All the kids want Paulie back, so the kids start a competition to find the "next Paulie Fink," and Caitlyn becomes the judge. It's all up to Caitlyn to decide the winner. Who will become the next Paulie Fink?
1663408557993.title: The Next Great Paulie Fink

1663409381387.content: Clay and four more dragonets are raised in a cave, and to be kept there untill their dragons and can fulfill the prophecy, to stop the war. But they get sick of living in a cave and decides to escape. But as soon as they do, they get captured by the Skywings and are chained up in the arena to fight for their lives. Can the dragonets escape again, or will they die trying?
1663409381387.title: Wings of Fire 1: The Dragonet Prophecy

1664077465571.content:
Thomas finds himself trapped in a maze with bunch of strangers and no memories except his name. Soon. he learns that the towering stone walls that surround them is a shifting maze impossible to solve. But after Thomas arrives, a few days later the first girl ever arrives with a message: Remember. Survive. Run.
Thomas and the group of boys need to find a way out of the maze or they can all die. Can Thomas figure out the maze that nobody has ever solved, and do that before everybody trapped in the maze all die?
1664077465571.title: The Maze Runner

1664077944381.content: When news report about Zombies attacking appears, his racist dad doesn't take it seriously. B doesn;t agree with his dad about racism, but he goes along with it to avoid abuse. B didn't worry about zombies attacking though, but when they attack his school, he teams up with different kids with different races to fight off the zombies. Can B save himslef? Even though it might mean losing a few immigrants?

1667616671261.content:
Akira is in the woods riding a horse when a wildfire starts growing around her.
Owen and George are spotting polar bears in the snowy tundra when it attacks.
Natalie is caught in middle of a hurricane with no shelter.
Akira, Owen, George, and Natalie are all swept up in the dangerous effects of climate change. Can the four of them survive when the chances are so low?
1667616671261.title: Two Degrees

1667617085130.content: Scientists discovered a substance buried underneath the Earth which happended to be the most valubale substance in the whole universe. And in exchange for the valubale resource, aliens from other planets offered to share new technologies. But other aliens wants it too and it's not long before war breaks out. So Leo, his father, and his brother leaves Earth behind. It's this journey that their spaceship got attacked and his father got kidnapped. The only chance for Leo to save his father is to hide and stow away on a pirate ship and stranding his brother behind. Can Leo manage to find away to save his father and his brother when his all alone in a pirate's spaceship?
1667617085130.title: Stowaway

1667617764540.content: The animals that live in the Manor farm are overworked and mistreated. So, the animals rebel and set up their own farm using democracy. 3 pigs, Napoleon, Squealer, and Snowball are declared new leaders. But as time go by, Napoleon and Snowball fights for power and one flees while the other turns into a dictator. It's looking like the Manor farm again, with pigs in charge this time. Can animal farm go back to their peace or will war strike?
1667617764540.title: Animal Farm

1667617874771.content: Greg Belmont is onrdinary. That's before he finds out that he is a magical dwarf. He finds out the day his dad brings a new kind of tea that awakens his dwarf magic. But soon after that, his father who happened to be the leaders of dwarves is kidnapped by trolls. Greg, with the help of fellow dwarf friends and a magical ax, made it their mission to save Greg's dad. But when the magic returns tention sparks high between the dwarves and their sworn enemies, elves. Can Greg and his friends defeat the elves and save his dad?
1667617874771.title: The Legend of Greg

1667618359547.content: Bell has lived his entire life on mars. And some stuff makes curious, like why the US colony doesn't interact with any other colonies on mars. But when a virus breaks out and every adult in the US colony gets ill, it's up to Bell and the other kids to save the adults and themselves. So Bell sets out on a mission to ask for help from the other colonies. Can Bell save the US colony and uncover the truth behind the relationship between US and the other colonies on mars?
1667618359547.title: The Lion of Mars

1667619220970.content: Dak and Sera finds a ring that could travel back in time in Daks basement. But when Daks parent found out, they had a fight and they accidently got sucked back into time. Then the hystorians, people who time traves to fix history recruits them on a mission to save Christopher Columbus from being thrown overboard in mutiny. Can Dak, Sera and a member of the hystorians: Riq, save Columbus and save Daks parents along the way too?
1667619220970.title: Infinity Ring 1: A Mutiny in Time

1667619627296.content: Katy Gordon is the best pitcher in the neighborhood, even though she's a girl. But when she tries out for little league she gets cut because of her gender. Katy decides to fight back and prove that she's not the only female to play baseball. Katy discovers a forgotten history of woman baseball, but the problem isn't researching, but convincing people and the little league to allow girls to play baseball. Can Katy make it to the league or will she be trying to accomplish a thing that can never be done?
1667619627296.title: Out of Left Field

1667620549182.content: Frost, Deedee, Wolf, and Bench has been friends forever. But when a new girl named Rose arrives everything changes. Rose is different from people in their middle school, and by letting her sit with them in lunch, their friendship begins to crack and it's not long before Frost has to choose sides between his friends. Can Frost rebuild their ffriendship or will it never be the same again?
1667620549182.title: Posted

1667620944781.content: Jake and Marisols whole family are reuniting for their last summer vacation at Nana's home. And thats when Jake and Marisol discovers a map that leads them to a lighthouse which happened to be a portal to a new world. They find themselves in the world between blinks, where lost people and things ends up. But Jake an Marisol needs to find a way back to their world. And to do that, they need to track down a man with the keys for the other world, and if they don't catch up he might destroy the world between blinks with them trapped inside it. Can Jake and Marisol find the man before the world gets destroyed?
1667620944781.title: the World Between Blinks #1

1667621416969.content: The two twin brothers Mal and Colm has to move to Chicago with their mom for a fresh start. Soon, they discover that their apartment building is strange in every ways. There's a woman who warns them not to wander around, wierd sounds are coming from the walls, and the elevator has no buttons for the 13th floor. Then one afternoon, it appears and Mal, Colm, and their neighbor Tamika finds themselves in a parallel dimension where the spirits of all former residents live on. Can Mal, Colm, and Tamika uncover the secrets of the building or will they be stuck in the dimension with no way out?
1667621416969.title: The Phantom Tower

1667628751855.content: Moses LoBeau washed ashore in a hurricane eleven years ago. Although she still tries to find her real mother, she's found a home in Tupelo Landing with a cafe owner Miss Lana. In Tupelo Landing, everyone knows everyones buisness and that's why it comes as a shock when detective Joe Starr comes to town asking about murder. And the murder lead to a series of events from kidnapping to a car crash to a hurricane and Mo with her best friend Dale gets caught up in the middle of it. Can Mo uncover the truth about the murder and the kidnapping?
1667628751855.title: Three Times Lucky

1667640494876.title: í† ë¼ì „

1667649965596.content: Gus is ready for a new season of basketball and things are going great with him. But when Cassie, one of his best friend joins the team things change real quick. Gus knows that even though Cassie is a girl, she's better than most of the boys and that the team needs a point gaurd which Cassie plays. Gus should be happy, but he feels the opposite and it doesn't help that Steve Kerrigan is on the team. With Steve trying to break Gus and Cassies's friendship and with Gus feeling like Cassie doesn't belong, can Gus get his friendship back on track?
1667649965596.title: Point Guard

1667650452662.content: Ben is a star football player. He can play most position and he's good at it too. But this year, Ben wants to be the starting quarterback and there is just one thing standing in his way: the coaches son is trying out for the same position. Shawn, the son of the coach, has high expectation to live up to, and if Ben starts over Shawn, it will devestate him. When Ben trys to help, Shawn turns him down and everything seems hopless. Now, Bens between being a good teammate and going after his goals. Can Ben find a way to help Shawn, or will he just give up and go for his dreams?
1667650452662.title: Game Changers

1667651318794.content: Little League star pitcher Nick Garcia has the chance to win Little League MVP and throw the first pitch in Yankees stadium. But he has bigger things to worry about. Nick's family lives in fear of ICE and it's not long before they can track them down. It gets worse when Nick notices a mysterious man lurking on his street corner and his worst fears are coming true. Can Nick and his family finally live like they belong or will things just get worse and worse?
1667651318794.title: Strike Zone

1667651661795.content: Rabi, Miguel, and Joe are practicing baseball when the first zombie apocalypse begins. Soon after zombies roam the town looking for meat and flesh. Rabi and his friends decides to investogate further and uncover the truth behid the sudden apocalypse. But day by day zombies are increasing and it's not long before Rabi, MIguel, and Joe has to find ways to protect themselves. Can they find a way to end the zombie apocalypse once in for all and not die along the way?
1667651661795.title: Zombie Baseball Beatdown

1667705964028.content: Serwa Boateng is an Adze slayer. She slays shape shifting vampires and she is the best at it for her age. She's been living with her parents, two of the best slayers in the world. But when a witch searches for a drum that can destroy the world, Serwa's parents go on a quest to defeat the witch. But that means Serwa has to live with her aunt and her cousin going to school like a regular human being. Just as Serwa gets used to being ordinary, a Adze infiltrates her school and it's up to Serwa to defeat it. Can Serwa deafeat the Adze without her parents here to help?
1667705964028.title: Serwa Boateng's Guide to Vampire Hunting

1667823243795.content: Piper liverd all her life in the poor part of the land and has never been to the dragonfly terriotory, where the people with the king's protection live. So, when Piper finds a girl with the dragonfly tatoo in the wreckage of a caravan in the Meteor Fields, she sees it as a chance to earn some money by taking her home. But the only way for her to go to the dragonfly territory is going by the 401, a train impossible to stow away on. For Piper, she's just doing it for money, but the journey turns out to be way more than that. Can Piper manage to find a way to get the girl home and survive too?
1667823243795.title: The Mark of the Dragonfly

1667824061787.content: Will Hunter just moved into a new town full of monsters. At least, that's what he sees anyways. But nobody else seems to notice, except one of his neighbors, Ivy. It's not only the monsters that strange though. So when the town people's pets all go missing, Will, Ivy and Linus( Ivy's brother) join forces to uncover the secrets of the town. Will doesn't think he's going to get seriously hurt. But in a twon full of monsters anything can happen. Can Will, Ivy, and Linus uncover the truth of East Emerson?
1667824061787.title: The Supernatural Society

1667826501000.content: Will is a small orphan who wishes to be the best warrior. But instead of becoming a warriors aprentice, he draws the attention of the mysterious rangers. Although Will wants to fight and go to war, he learns to be stealthy and have accurate shots with a bow and arrows. His life depends on his quick reflexes when there's an evil enemy lurking. Will can never be a true warrior, but with his stealth and skills as a ranger, he and the others will have to defeat the Great Enemy, Morgarath, whose thursty for power and revenge. Can Will defaeat Morgarath once in for all, or is he too weak and small?
1667826501000.title: The Ruins of Gorlan (Ranger's Apprentice Book 1 )

1667827075977.content: When Jake and Marisol returns to the world between blinks, they discover that nothing is the same. The Administrator is determined to control absolutely everything, and has ordered his Curators to catalog everything. With rebels putting their souls at risks, Jake, Marisol, and her brother Victor must find the item known as the 'Rocket'. This is their only chance of making things normal again, and if they fail, the world between blinks will be jeopardized forever. Can Jake, Marisol, and Victor risk everything to find the unknown item?
1667827075977.title: The World Between Blinks #2: Rebellion of the Lost

1668230018458.content: Amy Cahill and her brother Dan has been competing with their relatives to find the 39 clues first. They have survived assasination attempts, bomb explosions, and more. Now, they're on their final mission, with their ruthless relatives right behind them. But they don't know what's waiting for them ahead. With a final mission that could kill all of them, Amy and Dan isn't ready for the future. The fututre, with secrets that could cost them everything. Can Amy and Dan finish the hunt and survive it too, or is this the end of their short lives?
1668230018458.title: Into the Gauntlet

1669039775860.content: When Reuben discovers a secret antique watch with powers beyond his imagination, his life changes forever. Now, on a mission to keep the watch safe and uncover more of it's secret, Reuben is on an adventure full of danger and traps. Can Reuben, with a help of some friends defeat the most powerful man in the city who seeks the watch?
1669039775860.title: The Secret Keepers

1669040193386.content: Caleb doesn't want to be ordinary. So when he and his brother Bobby Gene meets Styx Malone, Caleb is thrilled. Styx is everything that Caleb wishes to be like,        and he is willing to do anything that Styx wants to. And Styx is determined to pull off the great escalator trade. But there's more to Styx Malone's story and as time goes by, Caleb isn't so sure about things anymore. Can Caleb and his brother find a way to make things right or are they too deep in it to back out?
1669040193386.title: The Season of Styx Malone

1670038202639.content: Amari's brother Quinton has gone missing for months. Nobody belives that Quinton is still alive except Amari. So when she finds a briefcase in Quinton's closet for a tryout at the bureau of Supernatural Affairs, she's certain that she can find clues there to figure out where Quinton went. But When she sign up for the bureau, she is stunned to see the supernaturals and the magic surrounding her. And now, to get closer to the key to Quinton's disappearance, Amari has to compete with kids who has been tought magic since they were born. Can Amai suceed and find her brother or will she fail to do so?
1670038202639.title: Amari and the Night Brothers

1670039182519.content: Ben Ripley is just a regular dork in his middle school. So it doesn't come as a surprise to most that he is recruited for a magnet school with a focus on sciense which is actually a coverup for a junior CIA acadamy. But Ben is not the athletic and talented agent that all the other kids are. He's just an ordinary guy who happens to be a genius. Now, Ben has to find a way to stay in the acadamy and prove that he could be a field agent, like he always dreamed of. But the acadamy has something that Ben is not prepared for: A traitor who wants to kill him and blow up the acadamy and everyone inside. Can Ben defuse the bomb and not get killed along the way?
1670039182519.title: Spy School

1670039844266.content: Ben Ripley's long time nemesis, Murray Hill has a plan to finally defeat him once in for all. By accusing Ben as an alien lizard in disguise about to take over the world from hiring multiple assasins and rewarding them for his death, Ben is on the run. On top of that, Ben must find Murray and stop his master plan before it's too late. It doesn't help that some of Ben's fellow agents is not doing their best. Now, Ben has to prove that he can be a real spy and stop Murray. Can Ben suceed on one of his hardest missions or will this time he fail?
1670039844266.title: Spy School Project X

1670041002811.content: Brendan, Elanor, and Cordelia has to move to an old house, which used to belong to a novelist Denver Kristoff. By the time they moved in, their sinister neighbor who happens to be a witch and calls herself "Daughter of Denver Kristoff' has evil plans for them. Soon, the siblings realize that they are stuck in a world with murderous medieval warriors, crazy pirates, and more. To survive, the three of them would have to fight against their desire to chose their dark side. But as time goes on, the siblings discover that the entire world is at stake. Can Brendan, Elanor, and Cordelia save the world before evil takes over?
1670041002811.title: House of Secrets

1670057741291.content: Ana Dakkar, a freshmen in Harding Pencroft acadamy were with her classmates on a bus ride when their academy gets blown up by the evil rival schools. But it gets worse when Ana learns that the rival school, Land Institute is after a technology that can destroy the world. Ana and her classmates has no choice but to race against the deadly enemies. And along the way, discover secrets that would blow their mind. Can Ana lead a bunch of freshmen against Land Institute and their evil forces?
1670057741291.title: Daughter of the Deep

1670152220931.content: Andrew Bean might be a superhero sidekick in training for a secret organization, but his life is more boring than how normal people usually live. And Andrew's powers are having super senses like taste, smell, hearing, sight, and touch which isn't that cool either. But his life changes suddenly when villains attack his city. With heroes disappearing and Andrew's own problems, Andrew has to find a way to be a real hero for once. Can Andrew really become a hero and save his city?
1670152220931.title: Sidekicked

1671110609835.content: Min isn't an ordinary human being. She's a fox spirit and has the ability to transform and charm people. But to keep her safe, her mother insists on keeping their magic safe. Min's tired of holding back and wants to join the space force along with her brother Jun. But things turn around real quick when Min gets the message that Jun had deserted his post to find the magical dragon pearl. Min knows that there's more to the story and decideds to run away and find her brother. In her quest she would face more danger than ever to find the dragon pearl and her brother. Can Min clear her brother's name and suceed on her quest?
1671110609835.title: Dragon Pearl

1671111076563.content:
Jason finds himself in a bus with no memories of his past.
Piper knows that time is running out for her father and that she must betray everyone she knows.
Leo has a big secret that killed his mom years ago and is powerful enough to destroy everything in his path.
Now the three of them joins camp halfblood to seek the missing goddess, Hera. But their just demigods with lots of gods and monsters willing to kill them. Can the three of them complete their suicide mission?

1671335876224.content: Robots aren't supposed to live in the wilderness. But when Roz opens her eye for the first time, she's on a wild island. Soon, she adapts to the environment to survive. 1671337113694.content: After hurricane Leo wrecks their town, Evan, Mitchell, Jason, C.J, and Ricky decides to go exploring in the woods. Can all five of them keep their promise or is the fort going to be discovered?

1671531115888.title: Let's Go for a Drive!

1671533370779.content:
The title of this book is 'Amelia Bedelia.'
This is a fun fiction story.
One day, Mrs. Rogers and Mr. Rogers gave work to Amelia bedelia and went out. So, she started to do things on the list.
The first mission was 'change the towels in the green bathroom.' But, Amelia Bedelia changed the towels' shape.
The second mission was ' dust the furniture', but she put dusting powder in the house.
The third mission was 'draw the drapes when the sun comes in', but she drew the picture of the drapes by the window.
The 4th mission was 'put the light out when you finish in the living room', but she put these light bulbs outside.
She continued to do silly things because she misunderstood the list.
Later, Mrs. Rogers and Mr. Rogers came into the house and saw these silly things. They were mad, but they forgot about being angry when they ate Amelia Bedelia's delicious lemon-marine pie.
I think Amelia Bedelia is off the wall! I want to recommend this book to my friends.
1671533370779.title: Amelia Bedelia

Hazel isn't supposed to be alive. She was brought back from the dead by her half brother and she's getting flashbacks of her evil past.
Frank is supposed to be strong. Being descended from heroes, and being a son of mars should make him. But he's just a klutz.
The three of them would go on a mission to stop the giants and other monsters. Chances doesn't look so good for their survival, but the world depends on them. Can the three do the impossible?
1673764086923.title: Heroes of Olympus, The, Book Two The Son of Neptune

1673764443742.content: The prophecy of seven is coming true. Annabeth, Jason, Piper, Leo, Percy, Hazel, and Frank has united to save the world. But there's a big problem. When Annabeth, Jason Piper, and Leo came to camp jupiter, they were supposed to come in peace. But some evil spirits got hold of Leo and sparked a war that would only help the monsters and Gaea. But that's just one of Annabeth's worries. She has been chosen by the goddess Athena herself to go on a quest that no children of Athena has suceeded ever. If Annabeth suceeds, the Romans and Greeks would come to peace. But if she fails, she would die and so would the world. With the faith of the world in their hands, can the prophecy of seven come true?
1673764443742.title: The Mark of Athena (Heroes of Olympus Book 3)

1673765049581.content: Magnus Chase has benn living in the streets ever since his mother's mysterious death. But now, 2 years after his mother's death, the uncle he never got to know approched him with a big secret: Magnus is a son of a Norse god. He doesn't believe it at first, but all the Norse myths are coming true. And to prevent the worst of the monsters from rising, Magnus has to search all of the nine worlds to find a weapon that has been lost for eons. Although the quest seems impossible, Magnus is a demigod and he has a daughter of Loki, a dwarf, and a deaf elf at his side. Can Magnus find the weapon and prevent the monsters from rising?
1673765049581.title: Magnus Chase and the Gods of Asgard Book 1 The Sword of Summer

1673765429690.content: After a year of fighting Percy's life is as normal as it can get. But his battling days aren't over. Soon, Percy discovers that the magical boundary at camp Half-Blood is not working which means that the monsters could attack the camp. Also, his best friend Grover has been kidnapped by a cyclopes who wants to marry him. To save the camp,  Percy has to find the golden fleece and save his friend Grover along the way in the sea of monsters. With Annabeth and a cyclopes Percy has to survive the sea of monsters and n=bring the golden fleece to safety with enemies ready to kill him. Can Percy survive both quests?
1673765429690.title: Percy Jackson and the Sea of Monsters (Book 2)

1673765906317.content: Oliver Zahn is ready to start another year as a spitball champion in Brightling Middle school. But he runs into a problem right away. His homeroom teacher, Mr Aidact catches his spitball with his inhumane reflexes and catches him in the act. If that wasn't enough though, Oliver has him for math too. But as weeks pass by, Oliver realize that Mr Aidact isn't what he lloks like. He can remember everything, has super eyesight, knows everything, and can teach everything as if he's a robot. Mr Aidact quickly becomes the most popular teacher in school. But Oliver knows something's fishy and decides to find out more about the guy. Can Oliver uncover the secrets behind Mr Aidact?
1673765906317.title: The Superteacher Project

1673766435829.content: Eleanor is sick of learning about survival from her granfather who's super serious about preperation for future emergencies. But Eleanor begins to take her grandfather's advice more seriously when she comes upon an article written by a harvard scientist's prediction. She learns that an asteroid will strike Earth in April bringing a second ice age. Eleanor is sure about this, but everyone else have their doubts. So Eleanor forms a club to prepare everyone else. Even if she does not know it, Eleanor's life is going to change thanks to a enormous asteroid. Can Eleanor prepare all her friends from a world ending asteroid, or is all of this just a big fat lie?
1673766435829.title: The World Ends in April

1674047147190.title: ìº„í‘ì˜ ê°œêµ¬ìŸì´. 1

1674126421020.content: Apollo is supposed to be the god of the sun, music, prophecy, healing and other stuff. He's one of the twelve gods of Olympus. But because of his demigod child who almost destroyed the world, he is sent to New York as a mortal and loses all of his powers. Right away he is mugged and then becomes a servant of a demigod child. He has to do all the things his new master ( the demigod child) orders him to do. From one of the most powerful gods to a puny mortal serving a child, Apollo has to complete his task and earn the favor of Zeus again. But with no godly powers and no gods helping him, Apollo's chance for survival doesn't look so great. Can Apollo return to OLympus to regain his powers as a god or will he die as a mortal?
1674126421020.title: Trials of Apollo, The Book One The Hidden Oracle

1674126837181.content: Apollo's somehow managed to survive the trials he faced at camp halfblood. But his troubles are far from over. He and his companions must find the most dangerous oracle from the ancient times. And standing in his way is a Roman emperor who would love to kill him. To survive his second trial, Apollo will need the help of a demigod, a sorcerer, and other allies. And it's not like Apollo's powers aren't back. Now for his second trial Apollo will have to survive and suceed this quest as well in order to get a step closer to being a god again. But his quests aren't easy and he has a bigger chance of dying then surviving. Can Apollo suceed and be the god he used to be again?
1674126837181.title: The Trials of Apollo, Book Two The Dark Prophecy

1674127380934.content: Apollo managed to survive his first two trials with the help of his friends. And his third trial isn't going to easier. On top of that, Leo has gone to warn camp Jupiter for a future attack living him with only Meg, and a saytr. For his third quest, Apollo, Meg, and Grover must go into the labyrinth in search of the third emperor and the oracle who can only speaks in word puzzles. There is hope for Apollo, but it will take big risks for things to go back to normal for him. The labyrinth is one of the most dangerous places to be in and that's where Apollo needs to go. He was lucky enough to survive the first two trials, but can his luck last?
1674127380934.title: The Trials of Apollo #3 The Burning Maze

1674127937612.content: For his fourth trial, Apollo's journey takes him to camp Jupiter, where the romans are preparing for the war that might end all of their lives against the evil Roman emperors. With friends like Reyna, Hazel, Frank, Tyson, and Ella counting on him to suceed, Apollo really needs this thing to go as planned. But the answer to their salvation is hidden in the forgotten tomb of a Roman ruler, someone more powerful and evil then the emperors he has already faced. Being the hardest trials of the four he faced, Apollo would need to suceed not just for himself, but his friends as well. Can Apollo survive yet again, or will this be the last of his trials?
