1675343105871.content: Eugenides somehow gets himself sentenced to the king's prison thanks to his eregant personality. It looks like his body will forever rott in the dungeon with no light or proper food. But Eugenides gets a chance to get himself out of the prison, when the king's magus offers him a deal: to steal a legendary object that only exists in myths. Now, an impossible quest waiting ahead in the future Eugenides has to make a choice to save himself from the terrible faith that might wait for him if he stays. With nothing to loose, he has to follow the magus's rule. But he has his own plans. With his life on the line, can everything go the way that Eugenides planned?
1675343105871.title: The Thief

1675343723860.content: Apollo has survived for months as a mortal. But his hardest task is yet to be done. Now the former god and his master demigod child must follow their next prophecy. But Nero has the powers and so does the python. With his final challenge at the tower of Nero, Apollo would need all the help he would. With Meg having her final battle with her stepfather and Apollowith his enemy, Python, everybody is counting on him to win and save the day. But Nero has other plans involving killing every single person in camp halfblood with a single press of a button. If Apollo suceeds he would finally get back to his throne in olympus. Anf if he doesn't, all of his friends would die trying to save him. With not only his life, but all the others on the line, can Apollo complete all the tasks once in for all?
1675343723860.title: Trials of Apollo, the Book Five the Tower of Nero (Trials of Apollo, the Book Five)

1675344462936.content: Aru has always been an outsider. While her fellow classmates all go on Paris and Maldives on their vacation, Aru is stuck at her home, also a museum as well. And to hide the truth she always comes up with lies to hide the fact that she stays home all the time. So it comes as no surprise when three of her classmates shows up daring Aru to prove that she isn't a liar. Aru decides to take on the dare and light up the lamp that was supposedly cursed according to her mother. Well, her mother was right and Aru just released 'the sleeper'. To save the world, Aru must now go on a journey through the kingdom of death. With odds stacked up against her, Aru has to stop the sleeper. But can an unpopular lying girl achieve something like that?
1675344462936.title: Aru Shah and the End of Time (A Pandava Novel Book 1)

1675345471077.content: When a plague strikes the small island that Leif lives in, he is forced to take a canoe and ride to the north with a baby before they catches the plague as well. But shortly aftertheir evcuation, both Lief and the baby catches the plague. Somehow Lief manages to survive the plague but the baby isn't that lucky. After the baby's burial, Lief is left alone to paddle northward to safety. With killerwhales in the sea, bears and eagles on the islands, and hunger in his body, LIef has to survive in the ocean with dangerous threats everywhere. HIs just a little boy in an ocean so big. Can Lief survive untill he can find a home in the north?
1675345471077.title: Northwind

1675346041835.content: Clay swears he has nothing to do with the graffiti on the school wall. But his teacher and his parents doesn't see it that way. And so Clay is sent on an mysterious island 'earth ranch" for troubled young kids. But as he gets to know the kids and the island better, there are one surprise after another. So when he discovers a secret library with a girl inside, he dcides to take his investigation farther. But it's a matter of time before he gets caught. Can Clay discover why everyone is acting so wierd? And can Caly uncover the whole truth that is kept hidden from him?
1675346041835.title: Bad Magic

1675483371863.content: When Lily and her family moves to her sick grandmother's house, magical stuff starts happening. First, a magical tiger from her grandmother's korean stories try to strike a deal with her. When Lily asks her grandmother about it, she learns that when her grandmother was a kid, she stole stories from the tiger and now they want it back. The tiger's deal is to get the stolen stories for her grandmother's health. But tigers are never to be trusted and Lily soon finds herself trapped in the deal. With her grandmother's health getting worse and the tiger getting stronger Lily has no choice but to give the tiger the stories. But stories are stolen for a reason. Can Lily save her grandmother and still manage to keep the stories safe?
1675483371863.title: When You Trap a Tiger

1675484867153.content: Odin, the all father, wise and powerful. Thor, the mighty, brave and strong. Loki, the trickster, cunning and clever.. The world of giants, dwarves, elves, gods, and humans. nine worlds in Yggdrasil, the world tree. All together they are Asgard (land of the gods), Vanaheim (land of the other gods), Alfheim (land of elves), Jotunheim (land of giants), Midgard (land of humans), Svartalfheim (land of the dark elves) , Niffleheim (land of ice and mist), Helheim (land of the dead), and Muspelheim (land of fire). This book shows the most accurate version of the full Norse Mythology.
1675484867153.title: Norse Mythology

1675485712616.content: Zane has a volcano in his backyard. Well a sleeping one where he spends his time alone. But when a twin engine plane crashes into his volcano, his life takes a huge turn. First there's this girl, Brooks. She shows up at his doorstep after the mysterious plane crash and offers him a secret. Zane goes along with it and learns that the volcano is  actually a prison for the Maya god of death. And Zane is caught up in an ancient prophecy that will very likely kill him and everything else. Now, with monsters and gods after him, Zane must stop the Maya god of death from escaping all because of some prophecy saying that his going to be freeing the god. But Zanes all new to the world of gods and monsters. Can Zane actually fulfill the prophecy and save the world?
1675485712616.title: Storm Runner

1676022967710.content: Leaf, born in the northern forest, doesn't have live a good life, and works tirelessly. Rain, living in the southern forest, doesn't accept her new leader, a drago speaker who is lying to other pandas and striking shady deals with monkeys. Ghost is supposed to be a leopard, stealthy and quick. But he can't hunt anything and he knows he doesn't fit in the snowy mountains. The three of them are strangers to each other, but a prophecy will bring them together. Can the three animals work together to fulfill the prophecy?
1676022967710.title: Bamboo Kingdom #1: Creatures of the Flood

1676023500925.content: Filomena is sick of her life. She's always bullied in school and is given no freedom by her overprotective parents. So she relys on her favorite book series: Never After. But when the thirteenth book of the Never After doesn't get published at all, and characters from the book follows her asking her for help, everything changes in a flash. She thinks she's imagining it at first, but things get more urgent and Filomena is off on an adventure with a fictional character from a book. Soon, Filomena is at the world that only exsists in her favorite book series. And she must find a way to save the world before the Ogres take over. Can Filomena save the world when in real life, she's just a nerd?
1676023500925.title: Never After: The Thirteenth Fairy

1676041438304.content: Reynie, Sticky, Kate, and Constance are the four kids that past a test. They become a team and meat Mr. Benedict. Mr. Benedict needs help from children and the four kids need to stop the emergency that is happening. They go to a school(forgot the name) on another island and meet Mr. Curtain, the person who is making the emergency and also who is Mr. Benedict's twin brother. The four kids and Mr. Benedict talk to eachother every night by morse code. Reynie and Sticky become messengers and meet the whisperer, a machine that is helping the emergency. At the end Constance destroys the whisperer and Kate realizes that Milligan is her long lost father.
1676041438304.title: The Mysterious Benedict Society

1676638444752.content: There's just a one in a 10 million chance of the plane crashing into the artic. But somehow, it does happen leaving only eight young survivors. The survivors are expecting ice and snow, but instead there's a jungle outside with wierd creatures. Their supply is running out and danger always threaten to strike every minute. With their lives on line, the eight survivors has to find a way to get rescued. But soon, they discover stuff proving that they're not on earth and infact, somewhere else, like a spaceship or a different planet. Can the eight of them somehow get rescued in a place that is not the planet earth?
1676638444752.title: Horizon

1676784563808.content: It hasn't been long since Aru Shah completed her last quest. But Aru finds herself on another quest not long after. This time, the god of love's bow and arrow has gone missing and the thief is using it to turn humans into zombies. And Aru is getting framed as the thief. If she doesn't return the bow and arrow, she will be kcked out of the otherworld forever. Fortunately, Aru has her friends to help her out in the crisis. Alongside her friends, Aru has to battle demons and monsters, and recover the bow and arrow. But the thief isn't making the task easy for them. Can just four kids go up against an army of zombies and demons?
1676784563808.title: Aru Shah and the Song of Death (A Pandava Novel Book 2)

1676785338069.content: The city spies are ready for their third mission as a group. This time, they have to stop the Umbra who wants to recruit a North Korean nuclear physicist. And the city spies have to keep watch on the physicist's son, who''s going to be competing in a chess tournament held in Moscow and Beijing. Meanwhile, Sydney's role is to befriend the daughrer of a British billionaire to protect her. This will be the hardest mission yet for the city spies, but they're ready to suceed again. But can they really do this?
1676785338069.title: Forbidden City
